# Admin Interface - LLM Context

> ⚠️ **BUILD OUTPUT DIRECTORY** - Do not edit files here.
> Source code is in [`admin-ui/`](../../admin-ui/).

## Overview

This directory contains the **built React application** for the admin dashboard. The source code is in `admin-ui/` and this directory is generated by `npm run admin:build`.

## Important: Do Not Edit

Files here are generated by Vite from the React source in `admin-ui/src/`. Any direct edits will be overwritten on the next build.

**To modify the admin interface:**
1. Edit files in [`admin-ui/src/`](../../admin-ui/src/)
2. Run `npm run admin:build` to regenerate
3. Or use `npm run admin:dev` for development

## Build Output Structure

| File/Dir       | Source                                  |
| -------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `index.html`   | `admin-ui/index.html` (Vite processed)  |
| `assets/`      | Bundled JS/CSS from `admin-ui/src/`     |
| `login.html`   | Legacy file (preserved)                 |
| `styles.css`   | Legacy file (preserved)                 |

## API Endpoints Used

The React app calls these backend endpoints:

```javascript
// Authentication
POST /api/admin/login         // Returns JWT token

// Server Data
GET  /api/admin/stats         // Server statistics
GET  /api/admin/players       // Connected players
GET  /api/admin/player/:user  // Player details

// Actions
POST /api/admin/kick/:user    // Kick player
POST /api/admin/ban/:user     // Ban player
POST /api/admin/force-save    // Force data save

// Configuration
GET  /api/admin/config        // Game config
POST /api/admin/config        // Update config
GET  /api/admin/gametimer-config
POST /api/admin/gametimer-config

// Metrics
GET  /api/admin/pipeline-metrics  // Agent pipeline stats
```

## Development vs Production

| Mode | Command | Port | Features |
|------|---------|------|----------|
| Development | `npm run admin:dev` | 5173 | Hot reload, source maps, API proxy |
| Production | `npm run admin:build` | 8080 | Bundled, minified, served by main server |
